plot outline: Four close friends Nandu, Madhu, Abhi and Krishna who go on a holiday trip to Goa and spot two enticing beauties Jaya Sudha and Jaya Pradha and start wooing them. The twist in the tale arises when these girls reveal that one of them is suffering from a lethal sexual disease which has been deliberately transmitted to one of them. Who are these girls? What is their motive is the rest of the story.
title: Best Actors
